divs: Sighting Detailsmy son and his girlfreind were going to pick up something and then pick up a freind. my son and his girlfreind watched 10 to 15 objects flying in the sky with orange stationary lights going from south to north,they watched these objects for at least 10 to 15 minutes,there was no sound eminateing from these objects.he swears they were not flares or planes nor lit candles or air baloons.they then picked up there freind they then saw one obbject comeing from south to north in a diffrent location,and had there freind with them which saw the object also.
Summary: on saturday night july 2 2011my son and 2 female freinds saw at least 10 to 15 objects a glow in the sky
